int  time_ji 
)

If both situations (I precedes J, J precedes I) are still possible, we simly choose one which minimises the time to execute both tasks

double  distij,

For intervals, where both options (I precedes J, J precedes I) are logically possible (equal, i during j, j during i), we would like to test, if time, which is needed for travel, doesnt exclude one option

Parameters
